name: Fishy Solution
description:
Entry for the Godot Wild Jam #18. Theme: PLAGUE

A new type of fish able to eat plastic was created in laboratories.
Control a school of fish to clean the oceans!

LEFT MOUSE to direct the fish.
ESCAPE to open menu.

For now there is a bug where collisions do not register.
To solve in-game press ESCAPE, open the menu and restart the level until everything is working.
